name: Imperial Flame
text: Main / #Counter You may place 3 cards from your trash at the bottom of your deck in any order: K.Q. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less.

effect.text: You may place 3 cards from your trash at the bottom of your deck in any order: K.Q. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' in image, but rarity and ID are read from printed text.
